about.title: About Genius Tech
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Device Repair Partner in Dubai
about.description: At Genius Tech, we specialize in fast, professional, and affordable repair solutions for all your electronic devices. From smartphones and tablets to laptops, gaming consoles, smartwatches, and beyond—we fix it all with precision and care.
about.mission: Based in Dubai Marina, our certified experts use only genuine parts, advanced tools, and deep technical expertise to deliver reliable results every time. Whether it's a cracked screen, water damage, battery issues, or software errors, we offer same-day repairs, free pickup & delivery, and transparent pricing—with no hidden charges.
about.promise: Trusted by thousands of customers across the UAE, Genius Tech is known for quality, honesty, and exceptional customer service. Every repair comes with our commitment to excellence, and every customer is treated like family.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team

blog.title: Device Repair Tips & Guides
blog.subtitle: Expert advice on phone and laptop repair, maintenance tips, and guides to help you make informed decisions about your devices.

iphone-repair.title: iPhone Repair
iphone-repair.shortDesc: Screen, battery, and all iPhone repairs for every model
iphone-repair.description: Expert iPhone repair services in Dubai for all models from iPhone 6 to iPhone 15 Pro Max. We fix cracked screens, replace batteries, repair charging ports, fix water damage, and more. Same-day service with genuine quality parts.
features: All iPhone models supported (6 to 15 Pro Max)
Face ID and Touch ID repair

issues.title: Cracked Screen
issues.desc: Professional screen replacement with quality displays. We restore your iPhone's look and touch functionality.

issues.title: Battery Draining Fast
issues.desc: Battery replacement service to bring back your iPhone's all-day battery life.

issues.title: Not Charging
issues.desc: Charging port cleaning or replacement to fix charging issues.

issues.title: Water Damage
issues.desc: Expert water damage repair and data recovery services.

issues.title: Camera Not Working
issues.desc: Front and back camera repair or replacement for perfect photos.

issues.title: Speaker Issues
issues.desc: Earpiece and loudspeaker repair for clear calls and audio.

faqs.q: How long does iPhone screen repair take?
faqs.a: Most iPhone screen repairs are completed within 30-60 minutes. We offer same-day service for all screen replacements.

faqs.q: Do you use genuine Apple parts?
faqs.a: We use high-quality OEM-grade parts that match Apple's specifications for performance and durability.

faqs.q: Will I lose my data during repair?
faqs.a: No, your data remains intact during most repairs. We recommend backing up before any repair as a precaution.

faqs.q: Do you offer pickup service for iPhone repair?
faqs.a: Yes! We offer free pickup and delivery in Dubai Marina, JLT, and JBR areas.

macbook-repair.title: MacBook Repair
macbook-repair.shortDesc: MacBook Pro & Air screen, keyboard, and battery repairs
macbook-repair.description: Professional MacBook repair services in Dubai for all MacBook Pro and MacBook Air models. From screen replacement to logic board repair, our certified technicians handle all MacBook issues with expertise.

issues.title: Cracked Screen
issues.desc: MacBook screen replacement for Retina and standard displays.

issues.title: Keyboard Not Working
issues.desc: Full keyboard replacement for stuck or unresponsive keys.

issues.title: Battery Swelling
issues.desc: Safe battery replacement to prevent damage and restore battery life.

issues.title: Slow Performance
issues.desc: SSD upgrade and optimization to speed up your MacBook.

issues.title: Not Turning On
issues.desc: Logic board diagnosis and repair for power issues.

issues.title: Overheating
issues.desc: Thermal paste replacement and fan cleaning service.

faqs.q: How long does MacBook screen repair take?
faqs.a: MacBook screen repairs typically take 1-2 hours depending on the model and availability of parts.

faqs.q: Can you repair MacBook logic boards?
faqs.a: Yes, we offer component-level logic board repair which is more cost-effective than full board replacement.

faqs.q: Do you offer MacBook upgrade services?
faqs.a: Yes, we can upgrade your MacBook's SSD for more storage and faster performance.

faqs.q: Is my data safe during MacBook repair?
faqs.a: We take data security seriously. Your data remains on your device and we can help with backup if needed.

android-repair.title: Android Phone Repair
android-repair.shortDesc: Samsung, Google, OnePlus, and all Android phone repairs
android-repair.description: Expert Android phone repair services in Dubai for Samsung Galaxy, Google Pixel, OnePlus, Huawei, Xiaomi, and all other Android brands. We fix screens, batteries, charging ports, and more.
features: Samsung Galaxy S and Note series

issues.title: Cracked Screen
issues.desc: Screen replacement for all Android phones with quality AMOLED and LCD displays.

issues.title: Battery Issues
issues.desc: Battery replacement for Samsung, Google Pixel, and other Android phones.

issues.title: Charging Problems
issues.desc: USB-C port repair and replacement for charging issues.

issues.title: Water Damage
issues.desc: Professional water damage repair and component cleaning.

issues.title: Camera Problems
issues.desc: Camera module replacement for blurry or non-functional cameras.

issues.title: Software Issues
issues.desc: Factory reset, software update, and troubleshooting services.

faqs.q: Do you repair all Android brands?
faqs.a: Yes, we repair Samsung, Google, OnePlus, Huawei, Xiaomi, Oppo, Vivo, and most other Android brands.

faqs.q: How much does Samsung screen repair cost?
faqs.a: Samsung screen repair cost varies by model. Contact us on WhatsApp for an instant quote.

faqs.q: Can you recover data from a broken Android phone?
faqs.a: In many cases, yes. We offer data recovery services for damaged Android phones.

faqs.q: Do you offer same-day Android repair?
faqs.a: Yes, most Android repairs are completed same-day, often within a few hours.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At Genius Tech, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our device repair services in Dubai.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect the following information to provide our repair services:

items.name: Name and contact details (phone number, email, address)
items.device: Device information (model, serial number, issue description)
items.location: Pickup and delivery addresses in Dubai Marina, JLT, and JBR

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information for the following purposes:

items.service: To provide device repair and pickup/delivery services
items.communication: To communicate about your repair status and updates
items.improvement: To improve our services and customer experience

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. Your data is stored securely and only accessed by authorized personnel for service-related purposes.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes. We may share information only with delivery partners to facilitate pickup and delivery services.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using Genius Tech's device repair services, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully before using our services.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: Genius Tech provides device repair services including:

items.repair: Repair and replacement of device components
items.pickup: Free pickup and delivery in Dubai Marina, JLT, and JBR

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.content: Our repair services come with warranty coverage:

items.coverage: Parts and labor warranty on all repairs
items.exclusions: Warranty does not cover physical damage, water damage, or unauthorized modifications after repair
items.claims: Warranty claims must be made by contacting us via WhatsApp with your repair receipt

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: While we take utmost care with your devices, Genius Tech is not liable for any pre-existing damage, data loss, or issues unrelated to the repair performed. We recommend backing up your data before any repair service.

data.title: Customer Data
data.content: We respect your privacy and do not access personal data on your device unless required for the repair. We recommend removing sensitive data or providing device passcodes only when necessary for repair verification.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Payment is due upon completion of repair service. We accept cash, card payments, and bank transfers. Prices quoted are final and include all applicable charges unless otherwise stated.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For questions about these terms, please contact us at
